000030.SZ.summary: FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company manufactures and sells automotive parts and components of environment control systems, chassis systems, steering and transmission systems, safety systems, engine accessory systems, etc. in China. The company offers climate control systems; steering and driving systems; engine accessory systems, such as differential locks, electric fuel pumps, oil pumps, clutch master cylinders, water pumps, and throttle bodies; chassis accessory systems, including engine beam, sub-bracket, rear axis welding, control arm, front frame, and oil pan assembly systems; and suspension and running systems comprising subframe-passenger, leaf spring commercial trucks, rear suspension passenger, passenger strut assemblies, shock absorbers for commercial vehicles, coil springs, torque rods, and control arm assemblies; braking systems; and other products consisting of fasteners, airbags, body control modules, grip brakes, torsion bars, brake camshafts, wiring harnesses, sun visors, gear controls, and automotive instrument clusters. It also exports its products to the United States, France, Italy, South Korea, Japan, and countries in the Middle East. The company was formerly known as Fawer Automotive Parts Company Ltd. and changed its name to FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company in December 2007. FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company is based in Changchun, China.

000559.SZ.summary: Wanxiang Qianchao Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells auto parts in China and internationally. The company offers roller, needle, seal, wheel bearing units, shock absorber assembly, precision forging, bearing, fuel tank, exhaust muffler system, automotive electronics, universal joint assembly, brake system, constant speed drive shaft, and drive shaft products. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Wanxiang Qianchao Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Wanxiang Group Corporation.

000581.SZ.summary: Weifu High-Technology Group Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells diesel fuel injection, exhaust after-treatment, and air management system products primarily in the People's Republic of China. It operates through three segments: Auto Fuel Injection System, Air Management System, and Automotive Post Processing System. The company's fuel injection system products include inline pumps, injectors, distribution pumps, spare parts, and filter products, as well as delivery valves, nozzles, and plungers. Its air management system products comprise gasoline and diesel turbo chargers; and exhaust after-treatment system products consist of catalysts, catalytics, and mufflers. The company also produces and sells engine accessories and purifiers. It offers diesel fuel injection systems that are used in diesel engines for trucks, passenger cars, buses, construction machinery, marine products, and generator sets; exhaust after-treatment system products for the manufacturers of automobile, motorcycle, and general machinery; and air management system products for small-bore diesel engine plants, six-cylinder diesel engine manufacturers, light and heavy commercial vehicles, and passenger cars. The company also exports its products to the Americas, Southeast Asia, and the Middle East. Weifu High-Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

000589.SZ.summary: Guizhou Tyre Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells tires in China. It offers passenger car tires; light truck and urban rail transit tires; tires for engineering, agricultural, and forestry machineries; industrial vehicle tires; and mining tires. It also exports its products to approximately 120 countries and regions, such as the United Kingdom, Italy, South Africa, and South America. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Guiyang, China.

000599.SZ.summary: Qingdao Doublestar Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells tires in China and internationally. The company is also involved in the research, design, manufacturing, installation, and consultation of casting machinery and equipment, rubber and plastics machinery and equipment, environmental protection machinery, and digital tire molds. In addition, it engages in the real estate business. The company is based in Qingdao, China.

000622.SZ.long_name: Hengli Industrial Development Group Co., Ltd.
000622.SZ.summary: Hengli Industrial Development Group Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells automobile air conditioning equipment in China. The company offers car, truck and engineering vehicle, and special vehicle air conditioning equipment; and air conditioning compressors and other products. It is also involved in real estate management and investment management activities. The company is based in Yueyang, China.

000678.SZ.summary: Xiangyang Automobile Bearing Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells automobile bearings in China. The company offers ball, TRB, NRB, CRB, CHB, CVJ, CJ, and other bearings. It also provides various bearing products in the areas of machinery, agricultural machinery, household appliances, wind power, etc. The company serves various heavy-duty, middle-duty, light-duty, and original equipment markets, as well as aftermarket. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Southeast Asia, and other countries and regions. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Xiangyang, China. Xiangyang Automobile Bearing Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Tri-Ring Group Co.,Ltd.

000700.SZ.long_name: Jiangnan Mould & Plastic Technology Co., Ltd.
000700.SZ.summary: Jiangnan Mould & Plastic Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells auto components. The company offers bumpers, moldings, grilles, license plates, spoilers, body side moldings, wheel opening products, rocker panels, fuel door covers, engine cover strips, and panels. Jiangnan Mould & Plastic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

000757.SZ.summary: Sichuan Haowu Electromechanical Co., Ltd. produces and sells automobile crankshafts in China. It offers passenger car and commercial vehicle crankshafts. The company is based in Chengdu, China.

000887.SZ.long_name: Anhui Zhongding Sealing Parts Co., Ltd.
000887.SZ.summary: Anhui Zhongding Sealing Parts Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells non-tire rubber products in China and internationally. The company offers sealing products, including O-rings, gaskets, and encoders, as well as oil, mechanic, bearing, PTFE, special, and air spring seals; and anti-vibration control technologies, such as engine and top mounts, chassis and torque bushings, exhaust hangers, dampers, stabilized bar bushings, spring pads, bumpers, and radiator isolators. It also provides fluid management solutions comprising power steering, cooling system, fuel system, clean system, and drainage pipes, as well as air intake and exhaust ducts; metal products, including stamping and casting aluminum products, and metal pipes; customized products for transportation, household, and other industries; and air beds. In addition, the company offers charging piles, cooling systems, and gas purifying equipment for new energy vehicles. It serves automotive, construction machinery, petrochemical processing, office automation, railway, and shipping industries primarily under the Dinghu brand name. Anhui Zhongding Sealing Parts Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is based in Ningguo, China.

000901.SZ.long_name: Aerospace Hi-Tech Holding Group Co., Ltd.
000901.SZ.summary: Aerospace Hi-Tech Holding Group Co., Ltd. provides automotive electronics in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company also offers aerospace products for the use in Shenzhou Spacecraft, which serves national projects, such as national manned space exploration and moon exploration. In addition, it provides oil and power equipment. The company is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

002048.SZ.summary: Ningbo Huaxiang Electronic Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells passenger car parts in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers vehicle interiors and exteriors, metal parts, automotive electronics, trims, and other related products and services. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

002085.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co., Ltd.
002085.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum alloy wheels for the automotive industry in China. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Asia, and other countries and regions. Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Xinchang, China.

002108.SZ.summary: Cangzhou Mingzhu Plastic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pressure and non-pressure pipeline systems, and films in China, the United States, Europe, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and internationally. It offers gas pipes, water supply pipes, biaxially-oriented polyamide films, pipe fittings, and lithium ion battery separators. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Cangzhou, China.

002126.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yinlun Machinery Co.,Ltd. offers oil, water, and gas heat exchange products. It provides oil coolers, including stainless steel, aluminum, and copper-tube oil coolers; and cooling modules comprising charge air coolers, water-air intercoolers, radiator, commercial vehicle cooling, engineering machinery cooling, car front-end, and other cooling module products. The company also offers exhaust gas recirculation systems, urea-SCR systems and aluminum die-casting parts. Its products are used in automobiles, engineering machinery, agricultural machinery, locomotives, wind power generation, generator units, ships, compressors, and industry and civil use applications. The company is based in Tiantai County, China.

002213.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Dawei Innovation Technology Co., Ltd.
002213.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Dawei Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells auxiliary brake products in China. The company primarily offers hydraulic and current retarders, and controllers. It also exports its products to Italy, Australia, South Korea, Thailand, the Philippines, Vietnam, Ghana, Panama, Cuba, Turkey, Tunisia, Chile, the United Arab Emirates, and Oman. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Terca Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to Shenzhen Dawei Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2020. Shenzhen Dawei Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002239.SZ.long_name: Aotecar New Energy Technology Co., Ltd.
002239.SZ.summary: Aotecar New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive a/c compressors. It offers scroll compressors, electric compressors, fixed displacement piston compressors, and variable displacement piston compressors. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Kingfield Garments Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Aotecar New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2015. Aotecar New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Nanjing, China.

002265.SZ.summary: Yunnan Xiyi Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobile engine connecting rod-based automotive components, machine tools, and other industrial products primarily in China. It offers rod assemblies, CNC machining centers, rod blanks, expansion broken links, link molds, ray machines, vertical rocker millings, vertical milling heads, aprons, machine tailstocks, aluminum rods, expansion broken links, linear guide rail gantry machining centers, vertical universal rocker millings, CNC gantry millings, and ream column products. The company provides its products under the XiYi brand name. It also exports its products to the United States, Japan, and internationally. Yunnan Xiyi Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1939 and is based in Kunming, China.

002283.SZ.summary: Tianrun Industry Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells crankshafts in China. It offers crankshafts that are used in marine, heavy-duty and light-duty, and passenger car applications, as well as in connecting rods, and castings and forgings; and con-rods, forgings, and precision machines. The company markets and sells its products through a network of agents and distributors under the TIAN brand. It also exports its products to South Korea, India, Turkey, the United Kingdom, Italy, Japan, the United States, etc. The company was formerly known as Tianrun Crankshaft Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tianrun Industry Technology Co., Ltd. in April 2020. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in Weihai, China. Tianrun Industry Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of thyssenKrupp AG.

002355.SZ.long_name: Xingmin Intelligent Transportation Systems (Group) Co., Ltd.
002355.SZ.summary: Xingmin Intelligent Transportation Systems (Group) Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and distributes steel wheels in China. The company offers tubeless, snow wheel, steel, and agricultural and forestry engineering series products. Its products include steel wheels for passenger cars, light trucks, heavy trucks, trailers, and agricultural and forestry machineries, as well as snow wheels. The company offers its products under the Xingmin brand name. It also exports its products to approximately 40 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Shandong Xingmin Wheel Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xingmin Intelligent Transportation Systems (Group) Co., Ltd. in July 2016. Xingmin Intelligent Transportation Systems (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Longkou, China.

002363.SZ.summary: Shandong Longji Machinery Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells automotive brake parts in China. Its products include brake rotors, drums, calipers, and pads, as well as heavy duty drums and discs; and hubs. The company also exports its products. Shandong Longji Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Longkou, China.

002406.SZ.long_name: Xuchang Yuandong Drive Shaft Co., Ltd.
002406.SZ.summary: Xuchang Yuandong Drive Shaft Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells drive shafts in China. The company provides small drive and tractors shafts, and drive shaft parts, as well as products for pickup trucks, SUVs, and powered mechanical cars. Its products are also used in construction machineries. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in Xuchang, China.

002434.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Wanliyang Co., Ltd. operates in the automobile transmission industry in China and internationally. The company develops, manufactures, and sells automotive products, including passenger car transmission and commercial vehicle transmission for use in sedans, SUVs, MPVs, micro trucks, light trucks, mid trucks, heavy trucks, buses, and other models. It also provides automotive interior products, such as dashboards, door panels, center consoles, columns, guards, bumpers, steering wheels, etc. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Wanliyang Transmission Company Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Wanliyang Co., Ltd. in January 2016. Zhejiang Wanliyang Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

002454.SZ.long_name: Songz Automobile Air Conditioning Co., Ltd.
002454.SZ.summary: Songz Automobile Air Conditioning Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and marketing of air-conditioners for use in the commercial and passenger vehicles in China. The company offers air-conditioning systems that are used in various types of large and medium-sized passenger vehicles, passenger cars and commercial vehicles, trucks, light-duty buses, rail vehicles, and bus rapid transit system buses, as well as in transport refrigeration. It also provides spare parts, such as compressors, condenser fans, evaporator fans, and accessories. In addition, the company offers repair, maintenance, and technical support services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

002488.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jingu Company Limited researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells steel wheels in China. It offers high vent, semi-fullface, full face, and light wheels; passenger car wheels; tubeless truck/bus wheels; trailer wheels; snow car wheels; UTV wheels; and agricultural vehicle wheels. It is involved in the production and sale of tubeless drop well steel wheels and auto parts; sale of automobile and motorcycle accessories; and provision of services, such as changing and repairing tires, dynamic balance, and four wheel alignment, as well as import-export business. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, and Southeast Asia. Zhejiang Jingu Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Fuyang, China.

002510.SZ.summary: Tianjin Motor Dies Co., Ltd. provides dies for the automotive industry in China and internationally. It offers aluminum, body side, skin, inner, HSS, inner, progressive, stamping, and welding parts; and hot forming products. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.

002516.SZ.summary: Kuangda Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of automotive interior fabrics and seat covers in China. The company offers woven, weft knitted, and warp knitted fabrics; chemical fibers; auto seat covers; and auto seat cushions. It is also involved in the investment, construction, and operation of solar photovoltaic power generation stations in various regions, including Qinghai, Yunnan, Jiangsu, Xinjiang, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, and Shaanxi. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Kuangda Automobile Textile Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kuangda Technology Group Co., Ltd. in August 2015. Kuangda Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

002536.SZ.summary: Feilong Auto Components Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automobile parts in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers automobile water pumps, engine intake and exhaust manifolds, electronic pumps, electronic switch pumps, turbine housing, flywheel housings, and oil pumps. It serves automobile, construction, agriculture, marine, and generating set industries. The company was formerly known as Henan Province Xixia Automobile Water Pump Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Feilong Auto Components Co., Ltd. in May 2019. Feilong Auto Components Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is based in Xixia, the People's Republic of China.

002537.SZ.summary: HyUnion Holding Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobile parts, special vehicles, electrical machines, and electromechanical components primarily in China. It also provides financial information, third-party payment, big data risk control, trans-border, and telephone operator charge settlement services. The company was formerly known as Qingdao Haili Metal One Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HyUnion Holding Co., Ltd. in August 2017. HyUnion Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Qingdao, China.

002553.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Nanfang Bearing Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, and sells needle roller bearings, clutches, and auto parts in China. It offers needle bearings, such as drawn cup needle bearings, thrust needle bearings, and one-way clutch needle bearings, as well as cages and needle assemblies. The company also develops and produces one-way clutch for engines of motorcycles; and sleeve and inner race for auto parts and overrunning alternator pulleys. In addition, the company's needle bearings are used in ABS, gearbox, throttle valve, and starter motor; and thrust bearings in automatic transmission and compressor. Jiangsu Nanfang Bearing Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Changzhou, China.

002555.SZ.long_name: Wuhu 37 Interactive Entertainment Network Technology Group Co.,Ltd.
002555.SZ.summary: Wuhu Sanqi Interactive Entertainment Network Technology Group Co., Ltd. focuses on the development and publication of mobile, browser, and html5 games. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Wuhu, China.

002602.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Century Huatong Group Co.,Ltd engages in the auto parts and Internet games business in China and internationally. The company manufactures and sells plastic parts and associated molds for vehicles, such as heat exchange and air conditioning plastic parts; lamp plastic parts; interior and exterior parts; safety systems; metal and non-ferrous metal stamping parts; and water assisted plastic parts. It also offers various gaming platforms, as well as mobile gaming products. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

002625.SZ.summary: Kuang-Chi Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells seat functional components for automobiles in the People's Republic of China. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Longsheng Auto Parts Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kuang-Chi Technologies Co., Ltd. in June 2017. Kuang-Chi Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

002662.SZ.summary: Beijing WKW Automotive Parts Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive interior and exterior trim systems, functional components, and electronic systems in China. Its products include quarter light moldings, B-pillar covers, fenders, wheel brows, roof racks, window moldings, roof side moldings, door frame moldings, beltline moldings, sunroof frames, C-pillar covers, instrument panels, center console trims, interior trims, interior door frames, door handle trim frames, ashtray covers, stereo trim strips, and center console frames, as well as plating decorative rings for instrument panels. The company also provides skylight frames, luggage racks, roof drip rails, side beam moldings, car exterior moldings, pillar plaques, aluminum interior ornaments, air conditioning controllers, air conditioning console and outlets, and seat heating controllers. Beijing WKW Automotive Parts Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002664.SZ.summary: Changying Xinzhi Technology Co.,Ltd. produces and sells stator cores and lamination cores for use in the motor field of automobiles, electric bikes, and air-conditioners in China and internationally. It offers stator cores of automobile alternators, armatures of micro-motors, stator assemblies of automobiles, armatures of e-bikes, fans of automobile alternators, stator frames of automobile starters, stator cores of elevator traction machines, and others. The company was formerly known as Xinzhi Motor Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Changying Xinzhi Technology Co.,Ltd. in December 2017. Changying Xinzhi Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Jiaojiang, China.

002703.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Shibao Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, produces, and sells automotive steering system and components in the People's Republic of China. The company offers automotive steering gears, and other components and parts of steering system. It also provides power recirculating ball steering gears for use in light, medium, and heavy duty trucks and buses; power rack-and-pinion steering gears and steering knuckles for passenger cars; and EPS systems for use in energy-saving and new energy vehicles. Zhejiang Shibao Company Limited supplies steering products to automakers. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China. Zhejiang Shibao Company Limited is a subsidiary of Zhejiang Shibao Holding Group Co., Ltd.

002715.SZ.summary: Huaiji Dengyun Auto-parts (Holding) Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, production, and sale of automobile engine exhaust door series products for domestic vehicle and engine manufacturers in the People's Republic of China. The company offers valves for passenger cars, marine diesel engines, diesel engines, racing cars, industrial diesel engines, motorcycles, heavy duty trucks, and military vehicles, as well as generator units, engineering machineries, light trucks, buses, mini cars, hybrid cars, etc. It also provides threaded, special shaped, and shape specific valves. In addition, the company exports its products to the United States, Italy, Britain, Japan, Brazil, Argentina, Mexico, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and other countries and regions. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Huaiji, the People's Republic of China.

002725.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yueling Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells aluminum alloy wheels in China. The company offers classic, flow forming, low pressure, motorcycle, and ATV/kart wheels under the YUELING, ARTKA, FORZUTO, and DAUNTLESS brands. It also exports its products. Zhejiang Yueling Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Zhejiang Yueling Wheel Hub Making Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Wenling, China.

002765.SZ.summary: Landai Technology Group Corp., Ltd. primarily engages in the research, design, development, manufacture, and sale of power transmission assemblies, transmission parts, and die-casting products for the automotive, textile machinery, and general machinery markets in China. It offers manual, automatic, and new energy transmission assemblies; automotive transmission gears, engine gears, engine blocks, and steering gear housings; balance boxes and shafts; synchronizers, transmission housings, mechanical die-cast parts, transmission cases/cylinders, tooth products, and other components; and textile machinery components. The company also develops, produces, and sells touch screens, touch display integrated modules, capacitive touch screens, and touch display modules and cover glasses. Its touch sensors are primarily used in information terminals, such as tablet and notebook computers, industrial control terminals, automotive electronics, and IoT smart devices, as well as touch input interfaces. The company also exports its products to the Middle East. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Landai Powertrain Corp., Ltd. and changed its name to Landai Technology Group Corp., Ltd. in October 2020. Landai Technology Group Corp., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Chongqing, China.

002813.SZ.summary: ShenZhen RoadRover Technology Co.,Ltd provides automotive electronic products and solutions for car manufacturers worldwide. The company offers in-vehicle infotainment systems; car audio solutions; power tailgate systems; digital multifunctional instrument panels; smart seating systems; Internet of vehicles; and telematics solutions. It also provides advanced driver assistance systems, HD digital video recorders for cars, tire pressure monitoring systems, smart rear view mirror systems, parking sensors, head-up displays, headrest entertainment systems, and camera systems. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Roadrover Technology Limited and changed its name to ShenZhen RoadRover Technology Co.,Ltd in March 2012. ShenZhen RoadRover Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002863.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jinfei Kaida Wheel Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum alloy auto wheels in China. The company offers motorcycle and automobile wheels, bicycle and motorcycle rims, and electric motorcycle wheels. It also exports its products to approximately 10 countries, including the United States, Japan, the United Kingdom, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, etc. The company is based in Jinhua, China.

002906.SZ.summary: Foryou Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the automotive electronics, precision electronic components, precision die casting, and LED lighting businesses in China and internationally. The company offers car electronics, which include car audio, video, interconnection, and navigation products, as well as driving assistance systems, digital clusters, streaming-media rearview mirrors, 360Â°around views, head-up display products, car climate controllers, car air purifiers, vehicle cameras, and wireless charging and tire pressure monitoring systems. It also provides precision electronic components, such as mechanisms, smart projectors, and optical pick up heads and components; and precision die casting products, including automotive parts and components, precision 3C components, etc. In addition, the company offers LED lighting products comprising LED packages, power, lamps, etc. Foryou Corporation was founded in 1993 and is based in Huizhou, China.

002920.SZ.long_name: Huizhou Desay SV Automotive Co., Ltd.
002920.SZ.summary: Huizhou Desay SV Automotive Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of automotive electronic products in China and internationally. It offers in-vehicle infotainment systems, climate control systems, driver information display systems, automotive display modules/systems, and driver assistance systems. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Huizhou, the People's Republic of China. Huizhou Desay SV Automotive Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Continental Automotive UK Ltd.

002984.SZ.summary: Qingdao Sentury Tire Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells tires in China. It offers car, 4x4 and SUV, business light truck, winter, run-flat, field racing, and cross country tires, as well as aviation tires under the SENTURY, LANDSAIL, DELINTE, and GROUNDSPEED brands. The company is headquartered in Qingdao, China.

002997.SZ.summary: Rayhoo Motor Dies Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells automobile stamping dies, checking fixtures, and jigs for automobiles. It serves automobile self-brand enterprises. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Wuhu, China.

003033.SZ.summary: Qingdao Choho Industrial Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells automobile chains worldwide. The company offers motorcycle, automotive, king, garage, agricultural, and industrial chains; and PTO driveline shafts for use in heavy torque and agricultural machinery, such as round balers, hayrakes, and rotary cutters and tillers. It offers its products under the CHOHO brand. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Qingdao, China.

0096.HK.summary: Yusei Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the design, development, and fabrication of precision plastic injection molds in the People's Republic of China. The company also manufactures and trades in moulds and plastic components, as well as offers services for the assembly and processing of plastic components; and system designing and technical support services. It serves the manufacturers of branded auto parts and components, office equipment, and plastic components. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

0425.HK.summary: Minth Group Limited, an investment holding company, designs, develops, manufactures, processes, and sells automobile body parts and moulds of passenger cars in the People's Republic of China, the United States, Japan, Thailand, Germany, and Mexico. The company also manufactures, develops, and sells batteries and motor systems for electric vehicles, as well as optical parts, metal molds, automation machines, software, and production lines; manufactures buses, modified cars, and electric vehicles; develops and manages real estate properties; and offers bookkeeping services. In addition, it engages in the import and export trading, packaging materials wholesale, logistics, and technology import activities; trade and manufacture of metal products; manufacture and sale of electrical and electronic equipment; and design, development, import, and export of robots. Further, the company provides automobile glass, light metals casting, customer service and market development, agriculture, and management consulting services. Minth Group Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China. Minth Group Limited is a subsidiary of Minth Holdings Limited.

0951.HK.summary: Chaowei Power Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells lead-acid motive batteries and other related products for electric bikes, electric tricycles, special-purpose electric vehicles, etc. in the People's Republic of China. The company also manufactures and sells storage and lithium-ion batteries, as well as other related products; and electrode plate dividing papers and plastic battery cases. In addition, it is involved in the technical service of new energy vehicles; and property investment activities. Further, the company engages in the research and development of solar energy generating systems, and durathon batteries; and recycling of lead-acid battery and lead production. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated a network of 2,556 independent distributors, which sells its products under the CHILWEE brand name. Chaowei Power Holdings Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Changxing, the People's Republic of China.

1057.HK.summary: Zhejiang Shibao Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, produces, and sells automotive steering system and components in the People's Republic of China. The company offers automotive steering gears, and other components and parts of steering system. It also provides power recirculating ball steering gears for use in light, medium, and heavy duty trucks and buses; power rack-and-pinion steering gears and steering knuckles for passenger cars; and EPS systems for use in energy-saving and new energy vehicles. Zhejiang Shibao Company Limited supplies steering products to automakers. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China. Zhejiang Shibao Company Limited is a subsidiary of Zhejiang Shibao Holding Group Co., Ltd.

1338.TW.summary: Hiroca Holdings Ltd., through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automobile accessories in China. The company offers various solutions for process design and development, video frames, airbag covers, steering wheel, console, decorative door systems, and outside decoration. It also engages in the surface printing, surface coating, plating, real wood processing, and in-mold injection of vehicle interiors, as well as offers velvet stickers, paste paper, restructuring, and other products. In addition, the company exports its products in Japan, the Americas, Europe, Africa, and internationally. Hiroca Holdings Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Dongguan, China.

1899.HK.summary: Xingda International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades radial tire cords, steel cords, bead wires, and other wires. The company's steel cords and bead wires are used in car, light truck, cargo truck, heavy equipment, and other rubber products. It also offers hose wires for machinery, aviation, automotive, marine, oil drilling, and other applications; and sawing wires for use in semiconductors, photovoltaics, solar panels, integrated circuits, watches, lasers, crystal industries, etc. The company sells its products in the People's Republic of China, India, the United States, Thailand, Korea, Germany, Brazil, Slovakia, and internationally. Xingda International Holdings Limited is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

1930.HK.summary: Shinelong Automotive Lightweight Application Limited, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, and sells precision moulds in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers automotive and electrical appliance moulds, including hot-pressing, hydroforming, automotive injection, bicolour injection, and TV injection moulds; and parts processing services. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Kunshan, China. Shinelong Automotive Lightweight Application Limited is a subsidiary of Shine Art International Limited.

200030.SZ.summary: FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company manufactures and sells automotive parts and components of environment control systems, chassis systems, steering and transmission systems, safety systems, engine accessory systems, etc. in China. The company offers climate control systems; steering and driving systems; engine accessory systems, such as differential locks, electric fuel pumps, oil pumps, clutch master cylinders, water pumps, and throttle bodies; chassis accessory systems, including engine beam, sub-bracket, rear axis welding, control arm, front frame, and oil pan assembly systems; and suspension and running systems comprising subframe-passenger, leaf spring commercial trucks, rear suspension passenger, passenger strut assemblies, shock absorbers for commercial vehicles, coil springs, torque rods, and control arm assemblies; braking systems; and other products consisting of fasteners, airbags, body control modules, grip brakes, torsion bars, brake camshafts, wiring harnesses, sun visors, gear controls, and automotive instrument clusters. It also exports its products to the United States, France, Italy, South Korea, Japan, and countries in the Middle East. The company was formerly known as Fawer Automotive Parts Company Ltd. and changed its name to FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company in December 2007. FAWER Automotive Parts Limited Company is based in Changchun, China.

200054.SZ.long_name: Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd.
200054.SZ.summary: Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, distribution, and sale of motorcycles, auto parts, accessories, and machinery products in China and internationally. Its products include motorcycles engines; and automotive air conditioning compressors. The company is also involved in the research, development, wholesale, retail, and processing of mechanical and electrical products, home appliances, bicycles, and environmental protection products. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Jianshe Motorcycle Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd. in December 2017. The company was founded in 1889 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China. Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Chongqing Jianshe mechanical and electrical co., LTD.

200581.SZ.summary: Weifu High-Technology Group Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells diesel fuel injection, exhaust after-treatment, and air management system products primarily in the People's Republic of China. It operates through three segments: Auto Fuel Injection System, Air Management System, and Automotive Post Processing System. The company's fuel injection system products include inline pumps, injectors, distribution pumps, spare parts, and filter products, as well as delivery valves, nozzles, and plungers. Its air management system products comprise gasoline and diesel turbo chargers; and exhaust after-treatment system products consist of catalysts, catalytics, and mufflers. The company also produces and sells engine accessories and purifiers. It offers diesel fuel injection systems that are used in diesel engines for trucks, passenger cars, buses, construction machinery, marine products, and generator sets; exhaust after-treatment system products for the manufacturers of automobile, motorcycle, and general machinery; and air management system products for small-bore diesel engine plants, six-cylinder diesel engine manufacturers, light and heavy commercial vehicles, and passenger cars. The company also exports its products to the Americas, Southeast Asia, and the Middle East. Weifu High-Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

2025.HK.summary: Ruifeng Power Group Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in design, development, production, and sale of cylinder blocks and heads in the People's Republic of China. The company also offers structural components of cylinder blocks, including bearing caps and flywheels. It serves manufacturers of vehicles, including passenger, commercial, and industrial vehicles, as well as engine producers. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhou, the People's Republic of China. Ruifeng Power Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Dragon Rise Ventures Limited.

2243.TW.summary: HORNG SHIUE HOLDING Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies automobile body-in-white molds and inspection tools. It also offers tooling and technical consulting services. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

2488.HK.summary: Launch Tech Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides products and services to the automotive aftermarket and the automobile industry in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It operates through three segments: Automotive Diagnosis, Lift, and Overseas Sales. The company is involved in the research and development, production, and sale of car diagnosis, testing, and maintenance equipment; development, production, and sale of automotive diagnosis, inspection, repair, and maintenance software; development, production, and sale of auto electronic products; and provision of information network services. It also develops, trades in, and sells computer software and hardware, and peripherals; provides consulting services of electronic products and technical; and provides health care management consultation and health care products development services. In addition, the company provides mobile phones and communication products; electronic products development and distribution; chip development and distribution; goods and technologies import and export, and agent services; computer software and hardware technology development, distribution, and sale; computer network projects; computer graphic design; corporate image planning; and Internet information consultation services. Further, it engages in the production of automobiles maintenance machines and equipment, and automobile warranty machines, such as automobile spray booths, tire balancers, tire changers, 4-wheel aligners, frame racks, and automobile testing lines; and development and sale of computer software, information system software, and car sharing technology. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

300095.SZ.summary: Jiangxi Huawu Brake Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial brakes, wind proof devices, and electro-hydraulic driving equipment in China. The company's products are used in metallurgy, hydraulic structure, railway, vessel, hoisting transportation, and other industries, as well as in ports. It also exports its products to approximately 100 ports and wharfs in 5 continents. Jiangxi Huawu Brake Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Fengcheng, China.

300100.SZ.summary: Ningbo Shuanglin Auto Parts Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells auto parts in China. It offers powertrain solutions, which include automatic transmission systems; permanent magnet synchronous DC motors; and motor, vehicle, and battery control systems. The company also provides hub bearings; automobile accessories, such as interiors and exteriors comprises instrument and door panel, bumper, center control, and vertical column assemblies; and precision injection molding products, including SRS injection molding parts, precision plastic gears, air conditioner parts, fuel system precision injection molding parts, ignition coils, and speakers. In addition, it offers mechanic and electronic devices consist of seat motors, door and window motors, seat drivers, flexible shafts, electronic control modules, and automobile stamping parts, as well as aftersales services. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Shanghai, China. Ningbo Shuanglin Auto Parts Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shuanglin Group Co., Ltd.

300176.SZ.summary: Guangdong Paisheng Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells precision aluminum alloy castings for automobile engines in China. Its products include cylinder blocks, differential housings, gearbox housings, oil filters, thermostat seats, oil sumps, gear housings, lower cylinders, cam brackets, front covers, intake pipes, flywheel shells, oil filter cooler chambers, drain pipe cover assemblies, and ignition coil housings. The company also exports its products to Europe and the United States. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Hongteo Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Paisheng Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2019. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Zhaoqing, China.

300230.SZ.summary: Shanghai YongLi Belting Co., Ltd manufactures and sells conveyor belts in South Africa, China, Europe, Asia, the United States, and internationally. The company provides polyvinyl chloride, polyurethane, polyethylene, polyester plastic, silicon, flame retardant, high temperature, anti-abrasive, anti-static, knife edge, and turning belts. It also offers patterns; and fabrication tools, including spice machines, tooth punches, separators, and air heaters. The company's products are used in material handling, tobacco, textile, food, building material, automobile, fitness, agriculture, and other industries. Shanghai YongLi Belting Co., Ltd was founded in 1989 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300237.SZ.summary: Shandong Meichen Ecology & Environment Co.,Ltd. engages in garden greening and rubber non-tire business. It is involved in the garden ancient architecture and municipal utilities engineering, ecological restoration, soil and water conservation, technology development of ecological and environmental protection products, technical services, technical advice, achievement transfer, etc. The company also provides ecological gardening, soil repair, minerals, ecological water management, and air detection management services. In addition, it researches, develops, manufactures, and sells suspension, engineering plastic, and fluid pipe products; and elastic products damping noise reduction, as well as provision of system integration services. The company was formerly known as Shandong Meichen Science & Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Meichen Ecology & Environment Co.,Ltd. in December 2017. Shandong Meichen Ecology & Environment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Weifang, China.

300258.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Pacific Precision Forging Co., Ltd.
300258.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Pacific Precision Forging Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells auto forging gears and other precision forgings in China. It primarily offers automotive differential side and pinion gears, and automotive transmission monoblock gears. The company also provides bevel gears; axis products; and shaped pieces, such as cross shafts, ball pins, parking brake pawls, triangle axis, parking lock pieces, and star wheels. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Taizhou, China.

300304.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Yunyi Electric Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells automotive rectifiers, regulators, and other car electronic products in China and internationally. It offers charging, wiper, and motor control systems. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Xuzhou, China.

300320.SZ.long_name: Jiangyin Haida Rubber And Plastic Co., Ltd.
300320.SZ.summary: Jiangyin Haida Rubber and Plastic Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of rubber and plastic materials in China and internationally. It offers solutions for sealing and vibration damping systems for use in rail transit, construction, automobile, and shipping applications. The company offers its products under the Haida brand. Jiangyin Haida Rubber and Plastic Co., Ltd. is based in Jiangyin, China.

300375.SZ.summary: Tianjin Pengling Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, designs, produces, and sells automotive fluid pipelines in China and internationally. It provides automotive coolant, fuel, air-condition, power steering, and turbo charger hose assemblies; automotive sunroof drain hoses; and automotive molding press hose assemblies. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Pengling Rubber Hose Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tianjin Pengling Group Co., Ltd. in June 2018. Tianjin Pengling Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.

300391.SZ.summary: Kangyue Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and marketing of turbochargers for OE engine manufacturers and aftermarket customers primarily in China. It offers turbos for automotive, truck and bus, construction and agricultural machinery, and marine applications, as well as for stationary power in diesel, gas, and natural gas engines; and spare kits for turbochargers, such as compressor wheels, turbine wheels and shafts, bearings, housings, rings, actuators, etc. Kangyue Technology Co., Ltd. also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Shouguang Kangyue Turbocharger Co., Ltd. Kangyue Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is based in Shouguang, China.

300432.SZ.long_name: Mianyang Fulin Precision Machining Co., Ltd.
300432.SZ.summary: Mianyang Fulin Precision Machining Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells automotive engine parts. Its products include hydraulic tappets, mechanical valve tappets, hydraulic tensioners, rocker arms, hydraulic automatic tensers, valve rockers, variable valve systems, nozzles, variable valve actuation systems, direct injection systems, VVT and OCV products, piston cooling jets, auto-tensioners, and high precision machining parts, as well as precise components of automatic transmission and fuel injectors. The company manufactures lithium-ion battery cathode materials. Mianyang Fulin Precision Machining Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Mianyang, China.

300473.SZ.long_name: Fuxin Dare Automotive Parts Co., Ltd.
300473.SZ.summary: Fuxin Dare Automotive Parts Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of automotive components in China. Its principal products include pumps and electric pumps, motors, electronic control and automotive electronics, noise reduction insulation, and lightweight products used in steering, transmission, braking, automotive electronics, and body. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Fuxin, China.

300547.SZ.summary: Sichuan Chuanhuan Technology Co.,Ltd. produces and sells rubber hoses in China. It provides oil cooling pipes, fuel hoses, body attachment systems, cooling system hoses, turbocharger pipes, braking system hoses, power steering system hoses, in and out of the system hose, and nylon tubes, as well as assemblies. The company's products are used in automobiles, motorcycles, and other machinery. It also exports its products in the United States, Canada, Japan, Vietnam, India, South Africa, Italy, Croatia, and internationally. The company is based in Dazhou, China.

300585.SZ.summary: NanJing AoLian AE&EA Co., Ltd. engages in researching, developing, manufacturing, and marketing automobile electronics and electrical accessory products. It provides low-temp starters that include flame preheating devices, grid heaters, PTC, SCR, and glow plugs; AC control panels that comprise electronic, automatic, and manual AC controllers; and accelerator pedals, such as electronic throttles, floor type electronic accelerators, remote electronic throttles, and mechanical electronic accelerators. The company also offers shift levers that include AMT shift handle, MT shift handle, knob type change gear, electric gearshift handle, and AT shift lever assemblies; and other products, which comprises of ATS EGR valve systems, electronic throttles, door and window controllers, and right and left control panels. In addition, it provides transmission controllers, and other electromechanical vehicle accessories, as well as plastic molds. NanJing AoLian AE&EA Co.,Ltd was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300652.SZ.long_name: HangZhou Radical Energy Saving Technology Co., Ltd.
300652.SZ.summary: HangZhou Radical Energy Saving Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, manufacture, and sale of automotive bearings. It offers wheel bearings and hub units, tapered roller bearings, belt tensioners and pulleys, clutch release bearings, tripods for C.V. joints, and other products. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300680.SZ.summary: Wuxi Longsheng Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells engine exhaust gas recirculation (EGR) systems in China. It offers low pressure, diesel, and gasoline EGR valves; throttles; EGR coolers and modules; sensors; and controllers. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300681.SZ.summary: Zhuhai Enpower Electric Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of electric vehicle motor control systems. The company offers motor controllers, car chargers, DC-DC converters, and electronics. Its products are used in energy vehicles, low and medium speed electric vehicles, field electric vehicles, and other fields. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Zhuhai, China.

300742.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Yueboo Power System Co., Ltd.
300742.SZ.summary: Nanjing Yueboo Power System Co., Ltd. manufactures commercial vehicles, passenger cars, power train systems, and buses. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300745.SZ.summary: Shinry Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies charging and distribution solutions in NEV market worldwide. It offers DC/DC converters, on-board chargers, D+C integration products, CDU integrated products, and high power charging products, such as non-isolated type, isolated type, and bidirectional conversion chargers for passenger cars, buses, special purpose vehicles, and mini cars. The company also offers technical support services, including on-site technical support, services network, and lifecycle management services. Shinry Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300816.SZ.summary: ActBlue Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and sells diesel, gasoline, and natural gas engine exhaust after-treatment products. Its products are used for emission testing and calibration applications in vehicles. The company is headquartered in Chizhou, China.

300893.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Songyuan Automotive Safety Systems Co.,Ltd.
300893.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Songyuan Automotive Safety Systems Co.,Ltd. provides safety systems for automobiles in China and internationally. It engages in the research and development, design, production, sale, and service of automotive passive safety system products and seat safety devices, such as automobile seat belt assemblies and parts. The company provides products for mainstream automakers and seat factories. The company is based in Yuyao, China.

300926.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Bojun Industrial Technology Co., Ltd
300926.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Bojun Industrial Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive molds and parts in China and internationally. It offers roof, steering, vehicle seating, powertrain, interior and exterior, electronic, and door systems. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Kunshan, China.

300928.SZ.summary: HAXC Holdings (Beijing) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive cockpit electronics. The company is involved in customization and selection of core display devices, software system development, and sales of supporting devices for automotive central control and LCD instrumentation; and design of human-computer interaction, and user interaction/interface, in-vehicle Ethernet system, and other software and hardware products and solutions that are in line with the development of intelligent and electronic car cabins, as well as other general-purpose component products. Its products and services include automotive display screens, full LCD instrument software and hardware systems, and integrated cockpit display systems. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Beijing, China.

3606.HK.long_name: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd.
3606.HK.summary: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides solutions of safety glass for various transportation vehicles in China and internationally. It designs, manufactures, sells, and services automotive grade float glass, automotive glass, and locomotive glass, as well as offers relevant services. The company provides thermal insulation, sound insulation, head-up display, semi-tempered laminated, acostic, heating, dimmable, hydrophobic, dimming, antenna, ultraviolet-proof, water proof, solar energy heat insulation, lightweight, and ambient glasses. It also offers photovoltaic and panoramic sunroofs; exterior decoration products; and flush styling windows, as well as encapsulated glass and sliding window assemblies. The company was formerly known as Fujian Yaohua Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. in June 1992. Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Fuqing, China.

3663.HK.summary: Xiezhong International Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, production, and sale of automotive heating, ventilation, and cooling (HVAC) systems for sport utility vehicles, pickup trucks, sedans, and heavy trucks in Mainland China, the Kingdom of Morocco, France, Spain, and Slovakia. The company operates in two segments, HVAC Business and 4S Dealership Business. The company offers HVAC components, including evaporators, condensers, heater cores, radiators, intercoolers, oil coolers, and HVAC hoses and housings, as well as technical testing and related services. It also supplies HVAC systems and HVAC components for new energy vehicles and construction machinery, as well as other vehicles, such as light trucks and buses. In addition, the company engages in the sale of automobiles, and spare parts and accessories, as well as provision of after-sales services, such as repair and maintenance services. Xiezhong International Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

4FG.F.long_name: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd.
4FG.F.summary: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides solutions of safety glass for various transportation vehicles in China and internationally. It designs, manufactures, sells, and services automotive grade float glass, automotive glass, and locomotive glass, as well as offers relevant services. The company provides thermal insulation, sound insulation, head-up display, semi-tempered laminated, acostic, heating, dimmable, hydrophobic, dimming, antenna, ultraviolet-proof, water proof, solar energy heat insulation, lightweight, and ambient glasses. It also offers photovoltaic and panoramic sunroofs; exterior decoration products; and flush styling windows, as well as encapsulated glass and sliding window assemblies. The company was formerly known as Fujian Yaohua Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. in June 1992. Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Fuqing, China.

600099.SS.summary: Linhai Co.,Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells motorcycles, all-terrain vehicles, mini tractors, generators, and multi-purpose engines in China and internationally. It primarily offers motorcycle-engines, small gasoline engines, mopeds, forestry machineries, fire-fighting machineries, and sprinklers for sports ground. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Taizhou, China.

600114.SS.short_name: NBTM NEW MATERIALS GROUP CO. LT
600114.SS.long_name: NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd.
600114.SS.summary: NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd. produces and sells powder metal structural parts and magnetic materials components in China. It provides car parts, such as car engine, auto transmission, auto chassis, and other products; new energy parts; air condition compressor and refrigerator compressor parts for home appliances; and motorcycle engines, clutches, driven gears, and other components. The company also offers soft magnetic materials, including alloy powders, iron powder cores, and alloy powder cores for use in electric vehicles, charging piles, solar energy, UPS, white goods, and other fields. It serves automotive, home appliance, motorcycle, mechanical engineering, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Tongmuo new materials Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd. in March 2007. NBTM New Materials Group Co., Ltd. is based in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China.

600148.SS.summary: Changchun Yidong Clutch CO.,LTD engages in the development, production, and sales of automobile clutches in China and internationally. Its products include clutches, including driven desk and cover assembly products; and hydraulic lifting products, such as hydraulic locks and cylinders, and manual and electric pumps. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Changchun, China.

600182.SS.summary: Giti Tire Corporation produces and sells automobile tires. The company was formerly known as Hualin Tyre Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Giti Tire Corporation in May 2005. Giti Tire Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

600218.SS.summary: Anhui Quanchai Engine Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells diesel engines in China, Southeast Asia, Europe, and internationally. Its products include vehicle diesel, low-speed truck diesel, non road diesel, fire fighting/water pump, and generator engines. The company provides diesel engines for automobiles, forklifts, agricultural equipment, construction machineries, and generating sets. Anhui Quanchai Engine Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Chuzhou, China.

600386.SS.summary: Beijing Bashi Media Co., Ltd. engages in the media, automobile services, and investment and financing businesses. The company was formerly known as Beijing Bus Co., Ltd. Beijing Bashi Media Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China. Beijing Bashi Media Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Beijing Public Transport Holdings (Group) Ltd.

600469.SS.summary: Aeolus Tyre Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of tires for trucks, buses, earthmoving, and agricultural machinery. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Jiaozuo, China.

600523.SS.summary: Guizhou Guihang Automotive Components Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and distributes automobile and motorcycle components in China and internationally. Its automobile components include air filter and radiator series; car key assembly and switch series; and automobile door and window glass lifters, as well as aerospace product series and plastic extrusions. The company exports its products. It also engages in the technology development and research activities. Guizhou Guihang Automotive Components Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Guiyang, China.

600660.SS.long_name: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd.
600660.SS.summary: Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides solutions of safety glass for various transportation vehicles in China and internationally. It designs, manufactures, sells, and services automotive grade float glass, automotive glass, and locomotive glass, as well as offers relevant services. The company provides thermal insulation, sound insulation, head-up display, semi-tempered laminated, acostic, heating, dimmable, hydrophobic, dimming, antenna, ultraviolet-proof, water proof, solar energy heat insulation, lightweight, and ambient glasses. It also offers photovoltaic and panoramic sunroofs; exterior decoration products; and flush styling windows, as well as encapsulated glass and sliding window assemblies. The company was formerly known as Fujian Yaohua Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. in June 1992. Fuyao Glass Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Fuqing, China.

600676.SS.short_name: SHANGHAI JIAO YUN GROUP CO LTD
600676.SS.long_name: Shanghai Jiao Yun Group Co., Ltd.
600676.SS.summary: Shanghai Jiao Yun Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobile parts in China. It also offers road freight and logistics, road passenger transport, tourism, and automotive sales and after-sales services. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600699.SS.summary: Ningbo Joyson Electronic Corp. researches, develops, and manufactures automotive components in China, the United States, Japan, Germany, Mexico, Italy, Romania, Portugal, Poland, Brazil, and India. It offers human machine interface products, telematics, automobile safety systems, electronic components and assemblies, and electronic products; driver control systems, car connect, climate control, electronic control units, and sensor systems; e-mobility; auto safety products; and air intake systems, washer systems, air management systems, mirror systems, front grillers, fuel tank doors, and steering wheels. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

600741.SS.summary: HUAYU Automotive Systems Company Limited researches and develops, manufactures, and sells automotive parts worldwide. The company offers intelligent driving and vision products, and smart cabins; electric drive systems, thermal and battery management systems, and pump products; and automotive fuel systems. It also provides chassis systems comprising suspension, steering, braking, and transmission systems; and interior and exterior parts, seats, and passive safety systems. HUAYU Automotive Systems Company Limited was formerly known as Shanghai Bus Industry (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name as HUAYU Automotive Systems Company Limited on April 20, 2009. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China.

600742.SS.summary: Changchun FAWAY Automobile Components Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and sells auto parts in China. It offers car seats, instrument panels, door panels, seat frames, bumpers, grilles, mirrors, automotive filters, automotive lighting and stamping products, wheel assemblies, automotive electronics, and other automotive components. The company was formerly known as Changchun FAW Sihuan Automobile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changchun FAWAY Automobile Components Co.,Ltd in December 2008. Changchun FAWAY Automobile Components Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is based in Changchun, China.

600933.SS.summary: Ikd Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells auto high-precision aluminum die casting products for automobile industry in the United States, Europe, and Asia. The company offers wiper, filter, air condition, damper, steering, mirror, braking, engine lubrication, auto engine intake air control, auto transmission, engine electronic control, heuristic motor, and engine cooling systems, as well as oil pumps and cylinder blocks for auto parts suppliers. Ikd Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China.

600960.SS.summary: Bohai Automotive Systems Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pistons in China and internationally. Its pistons are used in passenger and commercial, engineering, marine, agriculture, general motor, and other vehicles. The company was formerly known as Shandong Binzhou Bohai Piston Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bohai Automotive Systems Co., Ltd. in October 2017. Bohai Automotive Systems Co., Ltd. is based in Binzhou, China.

601058.SS.summary: Sailun Group Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, sells, and services tires in China. It provides car, SUV, LTR, winter, explosion-proof, and racing tires; truck, bus, and snow tires; and construction machinery, mining giant, and agricultural tires. The company was formerly known as Sailun Jinyu Group Co., Ltd. Sailun Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Qingdao, China.

601163.SS.summary: Triangle Tyre Co., Ltd researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and markets various tire products. Its products include commercial tires, passenger tires, bias off-the-road (OTR) tires, radial OTR tires, jumbo OTR tires, etc., as well as specialty tires. The company provides its products through branches, as well as dealers and online in North America, Europe, Australia, Russia, and India covering 180 countries and regions. Triangle Tyre Co., Ltd was founded in 1976 and is based in Weihai, China.

601689.SS.summary: Ningbo Tuopu Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells automobile parts to automobile manufacturers in China and internationally. The company offers vibration control products, including powertrain mounting systems, chassis bushings, rubber metal parts, torsional vibrational dampers, and aluminum die-casting products; interior and trunk trims, interior trim materials, and acoustic and insulation products; and power chassis systems, such as sub-frames, control arms, and steering knuckles. It also provides mechatronic systems comprising intelligent brake systems, electric power steering columns, automotive mechanical steering gears, electronic vacuum pumps, brake vacuum switches, electric wastegate actuators, electronic water and purge pumps, seat pneumatic comfort systems, and electronic stability controls; and light alloy structural parts, including shock towers, torsion beams, chassis brackets, longitudinal beams, and B-pillars. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

601799.SS.long_name: Changzhou Xingyu Automotive Lighting Systems Co.,Ltd.
601799.SS.summary: Changzhou Xingyu Automotive Lighting Systems Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of automobile lamps. It offers interior lamps and LED headlamps. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Changzhou, China.

601966.SS.summary: Shandong Linglong Tyre Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells tires in the People's Republic of China. The company offers passenger car, SUV, winter, truck and bus, and specialty tires. It also exports its products to approximately 180 countries and regions, such as Europe, the Middle East, the United States, Africa, and the Asia-Pacific. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Zhaoyuan, the People's Republic of China.

603006.SS.summary: Shanghai Lianming Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the development and sale of auto parts to the automotive industry in China. It offers auto body parts, and automotive stampings and welding assembly parts. The company also provides supply chain management of third-party logistics services. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

603009.SS.summary: Shanghai Beite Technology Co., Ltd. provides metal products for steering and shock absorber piston rod customers primarily in China. Its products include rack blanks, semi-finished racks, finished racks, finished valve sleeves, semi-finished input shafts, semi-finished worm shafts, pinion blanks, semi-finished pinions, piston rod blanks, semi-finished piston rods, and finished piston rods. The company is based in Shanghai, China.

603013.SS.summary: YAPP Automotive Systems Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and markets automotive fuel systems to auto manufacturer in China and internationally. It offers plastic fuel systems and emission control systems. The company is headquartered in Yangzhou, China.

603023.SS.summary: Harbin VITI Electronics Co., Ltd. researches, manufactures, and sells electronic products for cars and buses in China. It offers bus switch, bus slave, bus bridge, bus processor, bus management, bus door control, bus fuel data acquisition, and bus signal distribution modules, as well as vehicle remote wireless monitoring systems and tire pressure monitoring systems. The company also provides combination, bus, and bus digital color LCD instruments; recorder display and printing, recorder identification, and vehicle traveling data recorder display and print modules, as well as vehicle traveling data recorders; central processors; central electric boxes; and retarder power switches. In addition, it offers ECU control units, including LED trunk light control modules, retarder control units, speed controllers, wiper intermittent controllers, flash relays, water level alarm controllers, rocker switch light boxes, overvoltage protection controllers, retarder foot controllers, and engine stall delay relays. Further, the company provides sensor products comprising liquid level alarm switches, capacitive and resistive fuel level sensors, temperature sensors, odometer sensors, air pressure sensors, water level alarms, low air pressure alarms, electronic speed sensors, oil pressure alarm sensors, temperature alarm sensors, magnetic reed oil level sensors, and swing arm oil level sensors. Harbin VITI Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Harbin, China.

603037.SS.summary: Shanghai Carthane Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells suspension related PUR products in China. It offers suspension products comprising plastic parts, dust covers, polyurethane buffer bit blocks, lower spring cushions, spring sheaths, recovery buffer stoppers, and spring upper support products; and control products, such as pedal assemblies. The company also provides polyurethanes products, including high-bearing polyurethane rubber tires; polyurethane elastomer products; and elastic wear resistant materials and high-load wheels. It exports its products to North America, Europe, Japan, Korea, etc. The company is based in Shanghai, China.

603040.SS.summary: Hangzhou XZB Tech Co.,Ltd researches, develops, manufactures, and sells valve train systems and parts for the car industry. The company provides valve cotters, valve spring retainers, hydraulic lash adjusters and finger followers, push rods, and tappets for heavy duty diesel engines. It also offers precision cold forming components for power tool, household electrical appliance, aerospace, machinery, and other applications. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Hangzhou XZB Tech Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Hangzhou Zuofeng Investment Management Co., Ltd.

603085.SS.summary: Zhejiang Tiancheng Controls Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of automobile seats in China and internationally. The company's products include construction machinery seats, commercial vehicle seats, passenger car seats, aviation seats, and child safety seats. Zhejiang Tiancheng Controls Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Tiantai, China.

603121.SS.summary: Shanghai Sinotec (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the development and production of automobile and turbocharger parts in China. The company offers bushings, turbine housings, turbocharger middle cases, turbine, and pull rods, as well as connecting and cover plate assemblies. It also provides import and export customs clearance, foreign exchange settlement, trade financing, logistics, export rebates, and other import and export services. The company also exports its products to North America and Europe. It serves automobile and turbocharger manufacturer companies. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Sinotec (Group) Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, China.

603158.SS.summary: Changzhou Tenglong AutoPartsCo.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells auto parts in China. The company offers air-conditioning pipe lines, such as compressor suction, IHX, compressor exhaust, expansion valve inlet and outlet, and condenser connecting pipe assemblies; auto heat exchange connecting tubes, including heater and oil cooling inlet and outlet pipes, and evaporator inlet pipes; and auto heat exchange accessories comprising filling valves, connectors, covers, flanges, and brackets. It also provides receiving driers; auto sensors consisting of diesel engine exhaust temperature, water temperature, and sunlight sensors; EGR cooling parts; auto precision aluminum tubes, such as intercooler, afflux, and flat tubes, as well as KOMO pipes; and reservoir package in master cylinder for automobile brake systems. The company also exports its products to North America, South America, Europe, Japan, and South Asia regions. Changzhou Tenglong AutoPartsCo.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Changzhou, China.

603166.SS.summary: GUILIN FUDA Co.,Ltd. develops, produces, and sells auto parts and components in China. Its products include engine crankshafts, automobile clutches, gears, precision forgings, and bolts. The company is based in Guilin, China. GUILIN FUDA Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Fuda Holdings Group Co., Ltd.

603179.SS.summary: Jiangsu Xinquan Automotive Trim Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, sells, and supplies auto parts in China. The company offers interior and exterior trim components and molds; and dashboards, passenger car cockpit system assemblies, and heavy truck top cabinets. Jiangsu Xinquan Automotive Trim Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Changzhou, China.

603197.SS.summary: Shanghai Baolong Automotive Corporation manufactures and sells automotive parts and components in China. It offers tire pressure monitoring systems (TPMS) for passenger cars and commercial vehicles, TPMS service kits, TPMS OE replacement sensors, pressure and temperature sensors, rain sensors, view systems, etc. The company also provides tire and wheel service products comprising tire valves and accessories, wheel balancing weights and related tools, wheel bolts and nuts, and others; and multi-functional steel exhaust components, such as tailpipes, cones, mufflers, etc., as well as air springs, hydro-forming automotive body parts, and aluminum parts. It serves car makers and Tier 1 suppliers, as well as the tuning market. Shanghai Baolong Automotive Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

603239.SS.summary: Zhejiang Xiantong Rubber&Plastic Co.,Ltd. produces and sells automotive seals in China. The company's products include door and window seals; decorative parts; and metal rolls, as well as rolled parts. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Xianju, China.

603266.SS.summary: Ningbo Tianlong Electronics Co., Ltd. produces and sells plastic parts for electronic products in China. The company offers industrial parts for use in medium-low and low voltage products, adapters, and low-voltage terminals and distribution cabinets. It also provides plastic casings for cellular phones and digital cameras; and high precision plastic parts, such as car cooling fans, gears, gear housings, BCM housings, GID/TID housings, brush holders, filter components, and other small components for vehicles. In addition, the company produces molds for consumer products, precision automotive parts, precision industrial products, etc.; and plastic parts for printers and other consumer products, wall plates, and power sockets, as well as engages in the turnkey assembly of cell phone and digital camera mockup. Further, it offers plastic bobbins for deflector yolks, transformers, and ballasts, as well as PCM parts, control wall plates, and other precision plastic components. The company also exports its products to Japan, North America, Germany, and other countries. Ningbo Tianlong Electronics Co., Ltd. is based in Ningbo, China.
